subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: My box is shipping tomorrow!
author: Lisby
full_text:
Is the speaker all I need or any kind of jack? For it?

Steve, will also ask Lisa if she's aware of the "technician" who will  
hopefully be assisting me? I just want to get confirmation or  
rejection of what I seem to be sensing.

Thanks!

Ann

On Dec 13, 2007, at 10:10 PM, Steve Hultay wrote:

> Ann,
>
> I went to radio shack and bought a speaker model #21-549 and it seems
> to work fine. I got mine yesterday and didn't seem to thrilled about
> the results and gave another try tonight. Tonight, i spoke to several
> different people in their own voices and really have to give credit to
> Mike and Lisa for making this communication keep getting better. This
> really is another valuable box in my research, as long as different
> designs become available i will test them all. Every box is unique
> and offers different results, but they all work off the same premise
> of raw audio bits. Real time communication is finally here and gets
> better every day, some day's frank's box is better and than some day's
> RS box...etc. Depends on your surroundings, your mood, the weather
> but all these devices have worked for me up to this point and i'm
> grateful.
>
> p.s.--here is the link to the speaker so you can get a visual.
>
> http://www.radioshack.com/search/index.jsp?kwCatId=&kw=21-
> 549&origkw=21-549&sr=1
>
> Your going to love this wild ride and watching new people get involved
> and posted results makes it all worth it for me.
>
> -Steve H.
>
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Lisby <lisby@...> wrote:
> >
> > I just got my notice. I think I may faint from excitement.
> >
> > Hey, fellow list dwellers who have one--what extra equipment to I
> > need to have to make this function (speakers, but not computer
> > speakers)? Anything else I can go out an get now? I am truly, truly
> > technology challenged, so guidance addressed to one like a toddler
> is
> > what I need.
> >
> > Ann
> >
>
>
>
